sentences.en: "Jeans," according to one company's promotional material, "are designed and made to be worn hard."
sentences.cn: 根据一家公司促销材料上所说的，“牛仔裤为耐穿而设计和制作。”

sentences.en: Aqua Mouse, Wave Products, Name Card Holder, Paper Tree, Promotional Gifts.
sentences.cn: 采购产品水老鼠, 波产品, 名字备置卡片烛台, 纸树, 赠送礼品.

sentences.en: Draft the overall - design advertising strategy and promotional program of the project.
sentences.cn: 制定项目整体广告策略及推广方案.

sentences.en: Fine Porcelain , Tableware, Promotional Items, Figures, Garden Products Garden Accessories.
sentences.cn: 采购产品瓷器, 餐具, 促销品, 数字, 花园,花园的产品配件.

sentences.en: He is hawking around a 15-minute, £5,000 promotional video.
sentences.cn: 他正在四处推销一部长15分钟、价值5,000英镑的宣传录像片。

sentences.en: I used my vtr to tape David Bowie's promotional film.
sentences.cn: 我用录相机录下DavidBowie的节目.

sentences.en: In a bold promotional stunt for the movie, he smashed his car into a passing truck.
sentences.cn: 为了给电影制造噱头以吸引眼球，他把汽车猛地撞向一辆驶过的卡车。

sentences.en: It can work in conjunction with sales and promotional activities to clinch a deal.
sentences.cn: 它与销售与促销两项工作结合起来招揽生意.

sentences.en: MARIA : That's right. I was helping to put together the promotional literature.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚: 是的. 我资助做推广宣传.
我们的员工制作了广告小册子.

sentences.en: Some companies have toned down the claims on their promotional literature.
sentences.cn: 一些公司已降低了宣传资料中标榜之词的调门。

sentences.en: The engagement of a well - known entertainer obviously gives the hotel an excellent promotional opportunity.
sentences.cn: 能邀请到著名的表演者显然是旅馆的最好宣传.

sentences.en: The promotional rates of this hotel are suBject to our room availaBility.
sentences.cn: 本宾馆促销优惠价根据客房供应情况而定.

sentences.en: This will give your promotional material individuality and style.
sentences.cn: 这会让你的促销品显得个性十足、格调高雅。

sentences.en: To enjoy the offer , members have to redemption requests within promotional period.
sentences.cn: 会员必须于推广期内递交换领申请,方可享优惠.

sentences.en: You can use the logo in all your promotional material.
sentences.cn: 你们可以将这个标志用在所有的宣传材料中。

words.tran_cn: 提升，[劳经] 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴
成为王后或其他大于卒的子

phrases.tran_cn: 促销活动；推广活动；行销活动；营销推广活动计划建议

trans.tran_en: Promotional material, events, or ideas are designed to increase the sales of a product or service
